plot outline: The film is a humorous take on the prevalent prejudices in society. The story is of a young IT professional, Karthick, who needs urgent money to take care of his ailing father who has been diagnosed with cancer. He approaches a loan shark to take care of this need, when he is unable to pay the money back on time, the loan shark threatens to take away his wife. To repay this loan Karthik resorts to unconventional methods of making this money. This sets off a chain of events that result in hilarious and sticky situations. Through these events we come to know how society judges or rather misjudges people and that situations and people are not always what they seem.
title: Vellaiya Irukiravan Poi Solla Maatan
plot: Story of an honest man and how he gets tangled in a web of black mails.
